page.title: 07FARMING IN LULWORTH
page.content: There are 3 farms in Lulworth. MR M CHILCOTT.HAMBURY FARM. His family have farmed here for 43 years.He has 250 acres.(25 fields) He grows wheat and barley.He has 93 cows(+42 young stock) & 20 chickens. MR B HEARD.BURNGATES FARM. His family have farmed here for over 27 years.He has 835 acres.(24 fields) He grows wheat,barley and grass.He has 1330 sheep(510 ewes,800 lambs,20 rams) 2 horses and 2 sheepdogs. MR P SIMPSON.NEWLANDS FARM. His family have lived here for 41 years.He has 519 acres.(20 fields) He grows wheat,barley and grass.He has 850 sheep(500 lambs)and 2 sheepdogs. All the farmland in Lulworth is owned by the WELD ESTATE.
